about_the_game:
The Soundweaver is a new support class relying primarily on their profound musical talent. Rain down powerful sound waves on enemies to protect your allies! The Soundweaver sets up portable loudspeakers on the battle field to support and boost their allies' morale and weaken their foes. Play a guitar solo and become a rock star! Feel absolutely invulnerable and rock out!


  • Notes of Pain

The Soundweaver plays a guitar solo. If your character manages to hit the right notes, the target will receive increased damage, while the Soundweaver restores their energy.


  • Notes of Agony


The Soundweaver plays a guitar solo. If your character manages to hit the right notes, the target will receive increased damage, while the Soundweaver restores their energy.


  • Rhythm of Strength

Inflicts damage to enemies in the frontal area. The allies gain a bonus to outgoing damage, while enemies receive damage over time.


  • Amplifier

Places an amplifier that can play Rhythm of Strength, Rhythm of Courage, Rhythm of Inspiration, and Fiery Solo.


  • Rhythm of Courage

The Soundweaver knocks enemies back and inflicts damage. All allies gain bonus to defense and restore health over time. The enemies receive increased damage from any attack.


  • Rhythm of Inspiration

The Soundweaver disorients the enemies around them. Allies' ultimate abilities restore faster. They can summon a divine weapon earlier. All monsters are slowed down. They deal lower damage. Enemy characters can't use Dashes.


  • Fiery Solo

Ability panel is replaced with a musical keyboard of four buttons. The Soundweaver plays a composition, and a melody comes out of the loudspeakers. While the character is playing in tune, they're invulnerable. Once a mistake has been made, the melody breaks.



  • Soundweaver Class Unlock
  • Unique Soundweaver Costume
  • Legendary Soundweaver weapon of the current generation
  • 21 days of Premium subscription
  • 3 000 Victor's Medals
  • 30 Stimulants
  • 30 000 Knowledge of Enemies

name: Skyforge - Soundweaver Collector's Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2160 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GTS, Intel HD Graphics 3000, or ATI Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer
  • Processor: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 275 or ATI Radeon HD 4870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: The Soundweaver is a new support class relying primarily on their profound musical talent. Rain down powerful sound waves on enemies to protect your allies! The Soundweaver sets up portable loudspeakers on the battle field to support and boost their allies' morale and weaken their foes. Play a guitar solo and become a rock star!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support
